issue.title: [CI] The conda environment files arrow/ci/conda_env_*.yml should have .txt extension
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6513](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6513). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The files `arrow/ci/conda_env_\*.yml` files are not yaml files, we should rename them to use txt extension.
